data.name: ENGAGE
data.description:
ENGAGE is a metaverse platform designed for professionals, event organizers, and corporations to build their own virtual worlds to provide metaverse services directly to their own clients and to build out new business models.  
 
Used extensively for virtual events, corporate communications, education, and training ENGAGE is used by clients such as KPMG US, Stanford University, Lenovo, HTC, KIA, and many other Fortune 500 companies globally to help make their virtual metaverse strategies a reality.  
 
ENGAGE “Link” is our publicly explorable persistent metaverse location where you can visit and socialize with other professionals and visit client-made metaverse locations to attend meetups, events, training days, and even full-length concerts. Our initial virtual world locations include Enterprise Plaza, Education Plaza, Creative Plaza, and Central Plaza for general meetups.  
 
Our enterprise and PLUS users receive additional features such as the ability to run private events, media streaming capabilities, access to our spatial recording features, and full access to our content development tools to build out immersive content quickly and easily which can be shared publicly or privately within your own organization. Coming soon all enterprise and plus users will also receive their own private metaverse apartment where they can invite friends and co-workers over to enjoy movies or experience immersive content together. 

Don’t just talk Metaverse - ENGAGE!
